name: Surviving 2020 (Archmagi, linal98, mccasim, andreathelam)
description: An Indie game based on the 2020 Pandemic/Quarantine global experience inspired by The Oregon Trail and created using the open source Twine platform. Surviving 2020 is a retro-style text-based adventure game that progresses from week to week as players have to balance their Health, Happiness, and Money while also navigating through various random events. Navigate through traumatic historical events and breakdown in leadership while trying to survive as long as you can.
